directions: Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add peas and snow peas. Stir to coat. Cook until just tender, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes. Stir in tarragon. Season with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds fresh peas, shelled or 1 3/4 cups frozen, thawed
title: Sauté of Spring Peas with Tarragon
